Plot: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.
Writer: Carole Eastman (screenplay), Bob Rafelson (story), Carole Eastman (story)
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Karen Black, Billy Green Bush, Fannie Flagg
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 18 nominations.
Title: Five Easy Pieces
